poem:
### Echoes of the Deep

Beneath the quiet seafloor shift,  
tectonics tug, in unseen rift —  
a ripple's breath, in whispered quake,  
tussles with the ocean's wake.  
   
Shallows shake, horizons brace,  
as amber warnings fill the space.  
Yet the great wave's whispered sigh  
gently passes, kissed goodbye.
